Summary
MyBio::File::SAM - Object implementing mehtods for accessing sam formatted files
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Included modules

Inherit

Synopsis
    # Object that manages a sam file. 

    # To initialize 
    my $file = MyBio::File::SAM->new({
        TYPE            => undef,
        FILE            => undef,
        EXTRA_INFO      => undef,
    });
Description
    This object offers functions to read a sam file line by line.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->set_type($$data{TYPE});
	$self->set_file($$data{FILE});
	$self->set_extra($$data{EXTRA_INFO});
	
	my $read_mode = "<";
	if ($self->get_file =~ /\.gz$/) {
		$read_mode = "<:gzip";
	}
	
	my $filehandle = FileHandle->new($self->get_file, $read_mode) or die "Cannot open file\" ".$self->get_file."\"  $!";
	$self->set_filehandle($filehandle);
}
get_commentsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_comments {
	unless (exists $_[0]->{COMMENTS}) {
		$_[0]->set_comments();
	}
	return $_[0]->{COMMENTS};
}
get_extradescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_extra {
	return $_[0]->{EXTRA_INFO};
}
get_filedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_file {
	return $_[0]->{FILE};
}
get_filehandledescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_filehandle {
	return $_[0]->{FILEHANDLE};
}
get_typedescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_type {
	return $_[0]->{TYPE};
}
line_to_entitydescriptionprevnextTop
sub line_to_entity {
	my ($self, $line) = @_;
	
	if ($line !~ /^\@/) {
		my ($qname, $flag, $rname, $pos, $mapq, $cigar, $mrnm, $mpos, $isize, $read, $qual) = split("\t",$line);
		if ($flag & 4) {return {};} # Unmapped read
		my $strand = ($flag & 16) ? '-' : '+';
		
		return {
			NAME          => $qname,
			CHR           => $rname,
			STRAND        => $strand,
			START         => $pos - 1, # convert position from one-based to zero-based
			STOP          => $pos - 1 + length($read) -1, # convert position from one-based to zero-based.
			FLAG          => $flag,
			CIGAR         => $cigar,
			SEQUENCE      => $read,
			SCORE         => $mapq,
			LOCUS         => 1,
		};
	}
	else {
		return {
			COMMENT_LINE => 1,
		}
	}
}
next_entitydescriptionprevnextTop
sub next_entity {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	while (1) {
		my $line = $self->readline or return;
		my $entity = $self->line_to_entity($line);
		if (exists $entity->{START}) {
			return $entity;
		}
		elsif (exists $entity->{COMMENT_LINE}) {
			push @{$self->get_comments}, $line;
		}
	}
}
readlinedescriptionprevnextTop
sub readline {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	my $fh = $self->get_filehandle or return;
	my $line = <$fh>;
	chomp($line);
	return $line;
}
set_commentsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_comments {
	if (defined $_[1]) {
		$_[0]->{COMMENTS} = $_[1]
	}
	else {
		$_[0]->{COMMENTS} = [];
	}
}
set_extradescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_extra {
	$_[0]->{EXTRA_INFO}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
set_filedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_file {
	$_[0]->{FILE}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
set_filehandledescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_filehandle {
	$_[0]->{FILEHANDLE}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
set_typedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_type {
	$_[0]->{TYPE}=$_[1] if defined $_[1];
}
General documentation
EXAMPLESTop
    # Read one line
    my $line = $sam_obj->readline();
    
    # Read one entity
    my %entity = %{$sam_obj->next_entity()};
